class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.table.AssemblyLoad
class.comment: Information about OCX controls that are used by the application

column.name: OCX_NAME
column.comment: Name of the external Active-X control that will be loaded when the menu is selected.

column.name: LOAD_OCX
column.comment: Name of the external Active-X control that will be loaded when the menu is selected.

column.name: OCX_VERSION
column.comment: Version of OCX file to be loaded

column.name: MIN_APP_VERSION
column.comment: Minimum version of the calling application that supports this control

column.name: OCX_TYPE
column.comment: Field used to optionally store the type of OCX. This field is used for extended study and subject attributes for dynamic entry screens

column.name: OCX_BLOB
column.comment: BLOB data storing the OCX cab file
